Articles.Content:
You would be in one of the other states?

What if KSP had towns and cities on Kerbin?

Someone would destroy all of them!

What if Colserra3 didn't facepalm on everything?

I don't know.

What if I am my own antimatter counterpart?

He would be obssessed by bumping into you and destroying Earth in the process.

What if Kerbals invaded Earth and engaged in a supergiant war with so many cool looking space battles ?

I'd carefully steal one of the intergalactic cargo ships that accidentally got abandoned, get as far away as possible and start my own independent business.

What if the N-1 rocket has been piloted by women?

I don't know.

What if i pressed the big red button?

You'd activate the ejection seat of a random nearby car.

What if hippopotamuses ruled the world?

Everything would be horrible

What if i were god?

Then I'd question your existence.

What if i was the devil?

Where's the definitive evidence that you're not?

What if Jool were twice as far from Kerbol as it is now?

Then I'd cry in a corner for 12 years because I luv Laythe.

What If Polandball could into space.

What's polandball?

What if I knew what polandball is?

you would have bursted into a pile of confetti

what if i would have eaten a kerbal?

idk.

What if What IS polandball?

idk.

What if What IS polandball?

Megalodon's avatar, Also Polandball subreddit: http://www.reddit.com/r/polandball

So what If Headcrabs were nice?

Then I would go hunt for some buttcrabs instead.

What if there were buttcrabs?

Ow.

What if mud?

Then... I have no logical answer to that.

What if I did?

What.

What if I have a new signature? Oh wait, I do, never mind!

Then we say sparkles and magic happens and glitter Glue

What if that didn't work...

I dunno.

What if nobody had an avatar?

Then the penguins would take over the world.

Don't ask me why.
What if somebody asked Fyre Flare "Why?" ?

*antimatter planet hits Earth* That's what.

What if I pressed a button, and that teleported every person over 5 that isn't well known to be stuck in mud in an estuary?

Then the world would stop (no more working people who aren't known no food no food means no life)

What if Jeb was just an interplanetary stunt plane pilot and interplanetary motorcyclist.
